Description: Rectangular fragment of a writing-board, made of wood, convex and inscribed in Demotic on one side, perhaps originally part of a box (?). literary text(?)
Curator's comments: Also in Leuven Database of Ancient Books: LDAB 51861 Other Reference: Farid 1995: p. 193, 14/15
Bibliographic references: Brunsch 1982-83 / Acht Holztafeln aus dem Britischen Museum, London (no. 3, p. 35-36.)
Vleeming 2015 / Demotic graffiti and other short texts gathered from many publications (no.2107, p.397-398)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51861) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51861)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
